syntheticQAs.question: What constitutes the Top-up Tax according to the UAE Corporate Tax Law?
syntheticQAs.answer: The top-up tax imposed on Multinational Enterprises in accordance with this Decree-Law and the rules and controls to be determined by the Cabinet under Article (3) of this Decree-Law for the purposes of the pillar two rules issued by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development.
syntheticQAs.source_quote: Top-up Tax: The top-up tax imposed on Multinational Enterprises in accordance with this Decree-Law and the rules and controls to be determined by the Cabinet under Article (3) of this Decree-Law for the purposes of the pillar two rules issued by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development.

syntheticQAs.question: Who is responsible for defining Multinational Enterprises in the UAE Corporate Tax Law?
syntheticQAs.answer: An entity and/or one or more of its member entities located in the State or in a foreign jurisdiction, as specified in a decision to be issued by the Cabinet at the suggestion of the Minister.
syntheticQAs.source_quote: Multinational Enterprise: An entity and/or one or more of its member entities located in the State or in a foreign jurisdiction, as specified in a decision to be issued by the Cabinet at the suggestion of the Minister.

syntheticQAs.question: What is the total percentage of the effective tax imposed on Multinational Enterprises?
syntheticQAs.answer: The total percentage of the effective tax imposed on them is (15%) fifteen percent.
syntheticQAs.source_quote: so that the total percentage of the effective tax imposed on them is (15%) fifteen percent.

syntheticQAs.question: What will Corporate Tax and Top-up Tax revenues be subject to?
syntheticQAs.answer: Corporate Tax and Top-up Tax revenues and Administrative Penalties collected under this Decree-Law shall be subject to sharing between the Federal Government and the Local Governments based on the provisions of a federal law in force in this regard.
syntheticQAs.source_quote: Corporate Tax and Top-up Tax revenues and Administrative Penalties collected under this Decree-Law shall be subject to sharing between the Federal Government and the Local Governments based on the provisions of a federal law in force in this regard.

syntheticQAs.question: When will the provisions of the Top-up Tax come into effect?
syntheticQAs.answer: The provisions of the Top-up Tax specified in Clause (2) of Article One of this Decree-Law shall come into effect as of the date specified in a decision issued by the Cabinet at the suggestion of the Minister.
syntheticQAs.source_quote: the provisions of the Top-up Tax specified in Clause (2) of Article One of this Decree-Law shall come into effect as of the date specified in a decision issued by the Cabinet at the suggestion of the Minister.
